text: My 2 boys hv been attending music lessons here for the past 10 years. The elder has been under the guidance of Mr Chua, his violin teacher all these while. The teachers are dedicated and staff helpful.

this branch is as memorable to me as the one in jurong east. the staff here are quite friendly and can help you if you require help. this place has a concert hall and there is occasionally performances held here

I start the drum lesson here and the teacher is friendly and very patient in teaching. I gain a lot from the lesson. Highly recommended!
The staff are very friendly and the teachers are  experienced and helpful. The studio is very large, clean and cozy.
